Description: Normal 0 false false false EN-US JA X-NONE A Les Paul Honoring the Rush Legend Alex Lifeson's most legendary guitar is his Gibson ES-355 in classic white. It's the guitar that is responsible for some of the man's most iconic riffs and solos. So it only makes sense that this Gibson Memphis limited-edition Alex Lifeson Signature ES-Les Paul, crafted to pay tribute to Rush's guitar hero, boasts many of the same touches. Its semi-hollow construction adds more warmth and clarity to your tone, while the MHS humbucking pickups deliver the sound of a great set of vintage PAFs. But this is a truly limited run, so get it while you can. Limited-edition Alex Lifeson Signature ES-Les Paul Features: · Semi-hollowbody Les Paul created to pay tribute to Alex Lifeson · Lifeson's signature featured above the highest frets · Classic Les Paul look and response in a 355-like package · 3-ply maple/poplar/maple semi-hollow body in compact form · Quartersawn Adirondack spruce top bracing for stability and a rich tone · Thermally treated center block design adds sustain and controls feedback · Comfortable 1-piece mahogany rounded "C" neck · Rolled neck binding and low-profile frets play fast and smooth · Historic tubeless truss rod improves neck stability · Adjustable ABR-style bridge with upgraded titanium string saddles · Bone nut for improved sustain · Solid Grover Milk Bottle tuners This is a gorgeous guitar. It has been played but never outside the home studio. Go to the address following for vid of the man himself discussing the instrument. rushisaband.com/blog/2017/04/04/4891/Video-of-Alex-Lifeson-discussing-his-new-Gibson-Signature-ES-Les-Paul-guitar https://youtu.be/MU3HgdEFwSw
Title: RARE! Gibson ES-Les Paul Alex Lifeson 2017 Classic White #68 of 200
Subtitle: Certificate of Authenticity #68 of 200
ConditionDescription: Guitar and case are in near mint condition. I never use "mint" or "perfect" as each persons definition is different. You will be hard pressed to find imperfections.
